questions.question_text:
Universal Containers wants to allow community visitors to submit support cases without logging into the community.
Which two features are required to implement this request? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
The two features required to implement this request are:

B. Web-to-case: This allows for support cases to be submitted via a web form without requiring users to log into the community or Salesforce. Web-to-case can be set up to automatically create a case record in Salesforce from the information submitted in the form.

D. Case feed actions: Case feed actions can be configured to provide community users with the ability to create a new case directly from the case feed, without requiring them to navigate to a separate page. This can improve the user experience and encourage more users to submit cases.

What can an administrator do to meet this requirement?
